name: Cat Swap Tiles
description:
Join the kitten on this amazing journey. Solve well-balanced puzzles, get through beautiful and challenging places and help the little cat to find his friend. No score, no timer and no pressure. Just relax and enjoy the game!





Features
  • 44 well-balanced swap tile puzzles;
  • Handcrafted beautiful art;
  • Peaceful and relaxing gameplay atmosphere;
  • Many Achievements
  • Easy to play even if you does not read in english
